about_the_game:
All characters in this game are eighteen years old or above.

Use various magic to solve the puzzles of the dungeon!

Will the princess make her way out of the terrorist's captivity? ?

■ Story (Synopsis) ■

People of June Holy Kingdom are all beautiful inside out.

Princess Nieple is known for her beauty and her talent in magic.

Despite her fame, she had a secret.

She is the horniest girl ever!

She got her hands on a dojinshi from Chief of Guards Lutte's hometown.

Reading the dojinshi every night, she had a fantasy of getting raped by ugly people just like the princess in the book.

One day, she was attacked by the terrorist organization Death Evil Men on her trip.

Lutte and she failed to escape and got captured by them.

When she woke up, she found herself in... ?

Nieple and Lutte ties to find a way out of the terrorist's captivity. ?

■ Feature ■

Use various types of magic to get out of the captivity!

Find creative solutions by using fire, water, thunder, wind, and earth magic.

There are only two actions required: Inspect and Magic.

When an item can be used, a pop-up message will show up. There is no need to try everything on everywhere.

Clues are always hidden with the objects. Think creatively to find the best magic to use.

* After finishing the game, the gallery will be unlocked.

All the XXX scenes including the ones you missed can be watched here.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game includes the following adult content:
-Nudity.
-Numerous nudity and sexual acts.
-Sexual acts by tentacles.
-Non-consensual sexual acts.

The game contains many depictions of nonconsensual sexual acts.
There are many sexual scenes involving physical restraints and frequent depictions of sexual violence.

name: Prison Break Princess
short_description: People of June Holy Kingdom are all beautiful inside out. One day, Princess Nieple was kidnapped by the terrorist organization Death Evil Men. She had a secret nobody knew. She tries to find a way out of the captivity. Use magic creatively to escape from the dungeon!
